title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
Introducing the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, the ultimate keyboard for FPS Gamers. This compact keyboard is designed with efficiency and functionality in mind, allowing you to optimize your workspace and take your gaming experience to the next level.

Featuring a sleek 60% layout, this wired keyboard offers a streamlined design without sacrificing any essential keys. With a total of 61 keys, you'll have everything you need at your fingertips for seamless gaming sessions.

The keycap colors of the Redragon K617 Fizz are White and Grey, providing a stylish and modern aesthetic that will complement any gaming setup. The keyboard utilizes Linear Red switches, which offer a smooth and quiet typing experience. These switches have a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, ensuring durability and longevity.

Immerse yourself in vibrant RGB lighting with 20 customizable presets. Adjust the brightness and speed of the lighting to match your personal preferences and create the perfect gaming atmosphere. The Redragon K617 Fizz also comes with software support, allowing you to further customize your keyboard with pro driver functionality.

But the Redragon K617 Fizz doesn't stop there. It offers additional features such as hot-swappability, allowing you to easily swap out switches without the need for soldering. This keyboard is also designed with FPS Gamers in mind, with optimized mouse space for precise and accurate movements.

Experience the power and versatility of the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard. With its compact design, efficient workspace management, and customizable features, this keyboard is a must-have for any serious gamer. Get yours today and elevate your gaming experience to new heights.
